ygData.subject: Illusion spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a few general questions about the Illusion spells. I remember before the patch that extended the length of time an illusion stayed in place, it lasted a
ygData.messageBody:
I have a few general questions about the Illusion spells.

I remember before the patch that extended the length of time an illusion
stayed in place, it lasted a few minutes. How long do they last now?

After casting Illusion: Minor Object
If you meditate do you register on a wantering MoBs hate list? My Druid
when in Treeform has been attacked while meditating by green MoBs.
Do Undead detect you and attack anyway?

I can't think of any more at the moment.

Thanks

--
Bahir
7th Season Enchanter
Bertoxx
